title: Episode 16: An Honest Conversation with Paul Van der Klay (Bachelor Spoilers!!!)
description:
Today I have a conversation with  Paul Van der Klay about honest conversations. If you enjoyed this conversations you can find more of Paul's content in the link below.

Paul's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/paulvanderklay
